headline: Why Steel Dynamics (STLD) is Gaining Attention for Materials Dividends in 2025
summary: Steel Dynamics, Inc. (NASDAQ:STLD) is included among the 13 Best Materials Dividend Stocks to Buy Right Now. Steel Dynamics, Inc. (NASDAQ:STLD) ranks among the largest steel producers in North America. Its main operation centers around electric-arc furnace (EAF) steelmaking, which relies on recycled scrap metal as its primary input. This approach has a lower environmental […]
